MAN.TITLE: pvm_gsize
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: returns the number of members presently in the named group.

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : string, string group name of an existing group.
: integer, returning the number of members presently in the group.

DESCRIPTION.P: pvm_gsize returns the size of the group named
Since groups can change dynamically in PVM 3.0, this routine can only guarantee to return the instantaneous size of a given group.
